title: Epsilon
text: Error tolerance is similar to the idea of how close $$x$$ must to a number if $$y$$ is epsilon away from another number.

title: Delta
text: The corresponding accuracy is similar to how close our estimate of delta for $$x$$ if $$y$$ is epsilon units from another number.

title: "a" in this contex
text: a is what $$x$$, the side lengths, are approaching.

title: "L" in this context
text: L is the maximum value the limit if approaching, which is similar to the maximum area.
